Title: Biutiful
Writer: Alejandro G. Iñárritu (screenplay), Alejandro G. Iñárritu (based on a story by), Nicolás Giacobone (screenplay), Armando Bo (screenplay)
Actors: Javier Bardem, Maricel Álvarez, Hanaa Bouchaib, Guillermo Estrella
Plot: A man dying of cancer tries his best to leave the world on his own terms.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 62 nominations.
Production: Menage Atroz, Ikiru Films, Mod Producciones
